channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Biden-appointed judge slammed by conservatives for 'lenient' 8-year sentence in Kavanaugh assassination plot
item.description: Conservative critics blast Judge Deborah Boardman's eight-year sentence for Justice Brett Kavanaugh's attempted assissin as too "lenient."

item.description: The carmaker may announce in the coming weeks about $5 billion in fresh money on top of a similar amount earmarked earlier in the year.

item.title: DOJ Opens Investigation Into Antifa-Indulging Portland Police
item.description: The probe follows the arrest of a conservative journalist who says he was taken into custody after being attacked by Antifa thugs.

item.title: Trump to federalize 300 members of the Illinois National Guard ahead of expected deployment to Democratic state
item.description: “This morning, the Trump Administration’s Department of War gave me an ultimatum: call up your troops, or we will,” Pritzker said in a statement.

item.title: How One Campus Rejoiced at Charlie Kirk’s Death
